KANTO LAMPO WATERFALL

KANTO LAMPO WATERFALL IS UNIQUE AND BEAUTIFUL WATERFALL WITH SLOPING POSITION AND WATER STONE STEPS

Kanto Lampo Waterfall is Bali Places of Interest of a beautiful waterfall tourist attraction located in Beng Village, Gianyar, Bali. Where this waterfall offers beautiful and natural natural beauty, where the water from this waterfall is very clear and the location is in the lowlands, unlike other waterfall tours which are located in the hills. Around the waterfall there are shady trees that make the atmosphere not hot and certainly cool, because the coolness doesn't feel tired when walking down the path to reach Kanto Lampo Waterfall. A view of a waterfall that you will probably never forget in your lifetime, with the uniqueness of the water stone steps, making the view of the Kanto Lampo waterfall very instagramable and iconic, enjoy this charm only at the Kanto Lampo waterfall

Location Kanto Lampo Waterfall

As a very popular tourist destination and often visited by foreign tourists, it would be nice if you know the location of this Kanto Lampo waterfall. Located on Jl. Kaliasem lingk. kelod kangin, Beng, Kec. Gianyar, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80513. If you drive from Kuta it will take about 2 hours drive to the Kanto Lampo Waterfall location, if you drive alone you can use a guide from Google Map to reach this location, and if you are confused you can ask tell local people about the location of this kanto lampo waterfall, and if you don't want to drive yourself you can contact us Bali Tour and we will offer a Hire Car and Driver program to visit this kanto lampo waterfall by offering a comfortable car accompanied by a friendly and experienced driver will make the trip to the Kanto Lampo waterfall very enjoyable

History Name Kanto Lampo Waterfall

Kanto Lampo waterfall is very famous among foreign and domestic tourists who are looking for a very phenomenal view in enjoying the beautiful natural scenery. The origin of the name Kanto Lampo waterfall is very unique, where the name is taken from the name of the Kanto Lampo Fruit around this waterfall. Maybe the name of the kanto lampo fruit sounds unique to you, it is true because this kanto lampo tree is a tree that is classified as very rare and has a very unique fruit, the color of the kanto lampo fruit can change from yellow to green and when the fruit is ripe When ripe, it turns red again, and the fruit from Kanto Lampo often falls into the waterfall and scatters in the waterfall, so the locals here call this waterfall the Kanto Lampo waterfall so it's easy to remember. Because the name is not difficult to remember and is quite unique, the name Kanto Lampo has also become famous along with the natural beauty of this stunning waterfall.

Holy Water Kanto Lampo Waterfall

Apart from being a very popular waterfall tourist destination, the Kanto Lampo waterfall is a sacred place for the local community, if there is a religious ceremony, the locals will come to this place to ask for holy water to be used as a means of religious ceremonies, and in the water In this Kanto Lampo waterfall, there is Beji Temple which is also often known as Beji Kanto Lampo Temple whose function is as a place for Mendak Toya Ning which means looking for holy water which is often used as a means for religious ceremonies such as Dewa Yadnya and Pitra Yadnya. So if you visit the waterfall waterfall, you are expected to maintain good manners and not do anything that can defile the sanctity of Beji Temple, which is located close to the Kanto Lampo waterfall. It's a very impressive experience to visit the beautiful Kanto Lampo waterfall with its unique stone steps

Unique Kanto Lampo Waterfall

The uniqueness of the Kanto Lampo Waterfall is located in the splash of falling water, the position of the stones in this waterfall is sloping and the rock surface is not flat or you could say steps, so that if the water falls it will not go straight down, but bounce off one rock with a rock. the other, the view of the uneven falling water makes the view of the Kanto Lampo waterfall very beautiful, if you come here and see this waterfall, you will definitely be amazed to see it, a very unusual sight, Kanto Lampo Waterfall is the only waterfall in Gianyar Regency, where most of the waterfalls in Gianyar tend to fall into the water and form a pool, in contrast to the one in Kanto Lampo Waterfall where the water does not fall directly but bounces into the water. The rocks here make a rather loud sound which makes it one of the hallmarks of the iconic waterfall n this kanto lampo waterfall, don't be surprised if it has just been introduced and has attracted the hearts of both foreign and domestic tourists. Many foreign and domestic tourists visit this place, because this waterfall offers something different, where the uniqueness is in the waterfall rocks, where there are stones that are tilted and an uneven surface looks like a stone steps, where falling water will pass through the rocks. and make the sound of gurgling water that sings to greet and tell that this is a phenomenal waterfall.

Water Source at Kanto Lampo Waterfall

Talking about waterfalls, of course you will think that most waterfalls come from mountain springs or natural springs, most waterfalls are like that, but this is different from the Kanto Lampo waterfall, whose water source does not come from mountain springs but comes from canals. irrigation water that flows in the ground and along with water in the ground which over time some of the channels are clogged and overflows which causes water to gush out in the downstream area, which overflows over time into a waterfall as you can see in this kanto lampo waterfall. And the local community keeps the water flowing so that the waterfall here continues to have water and is also a tourist destination in Gianyar Regency. Besides that, this place used to be a crossing between villages, after the Kanto Lampo waterfall became famous, access to this place was improved so that tourists feel comfortable to go to the location of this phenomenal waterfall.

Cave Near Kanto Lampo Waterfall

The other uniqueness of the Kanto Lampo waterfall tourist destination is that there is a cave located next to this Kanto Lampo waterfall, which according to local residents said that the cave is a cave used by colonialists who used to colonize it. the island of Bali and use this cave as a meeting place and strategize against the Balinese. This cave is no longer in use and also for the time being this cave cannot be passed and the mouth of the cave is also closed. as curiosity about what is contained in this phenomenal and beautiful Kanto Lampo waterfall tourist destination. This uniqueness adds to the beauty and mystery that is here, wrapped by the natural beauty that is very charming around it, making the atmosphere to visit this place very pleasant. You will not regret visiting this place, because as discussed outside, the Kanto Lampo waterfall is beautiful and in fact, the Kanto Lampo waterfall is very beautiful so it gives a deep impression on the hearts of tourists who visit this place.

Pathway to Kanto Lampo Waterfall

The location of Kanto Lampo Waterfall is not too difficult to pass, it is in a local residential area where the people are friendly and kind, for those of you who like trekking, then this waterfall advetures is suitable for your adventurous spirit, where to reach the waterfall you will go through a path where there are lush trees around and also not so many steps around 500 steps, but becareful the step bit slipery during rainig, due step make from stone, if get water will be bit silffer, so you don't need to be afraid of overheating, with a cool and natural atmosphere, then the trekking adventure to the waterfall will not be felt. Arriving at the location of the waterfall you will see the natural wonders where the beauty of the waterfall will make you admire the work of this nature, many tourists come here to swim in the waterfall or just take pictures to upload on Instagram. Because of the uniqueness of this waterfall, which is tilted with a stone steps, you can climb on a flat rock to be exposed to direct splash of water or just to be used as a background for your photo stating that you have visited this waterfall

What You Can Do at Kanto Lampo Waterfall

As one of the waterfall tourist destinations in Gianyar Regency, you can do some interesting things at this Kanto Lampo Waterfall that will complete your adventure at Kanto Lampo Waterfall. An experience that you may not forget on your vacation in Bali and visiting various waterfalls that are located not far away and with their uniqueness like water flowing on a stone terrace will add to the sensation of a very pleasant adventure. There are several things you can do here to pass the time while visiting the Kanto Lampo waterfall

  1. Bathing: Here you can soak by sitting on a rock and letting the splash of water fall on your body, it will feel like being massaged by water, a sensation that is very unforgettable. The splash of water from this waterfall will make your body feel refreshed, it feels like you're out of a spa that massages your whole body.
  2. Photography: Besides soaking in the water here, you can take pictures with the background of this Kanto Lampo waterfall, with a little lighting it will make the photo very iconic, a very extraordinary sensation to take pictures at a waterfall that is so unique and unique. very famous in this gianyar district.
  3. Nature View: In addition to the very beautiful view of the waterfall, the scenery around the waterfall is no less beautiful, located in a very natural interior, where many trees thrive and green make the natural scenery here very amazing, enjoy the fresh air here and the natural atmosphere

Previously before this waterfall was famous, this place was only used by the sand and stones in this place to be used as material to make buildings, but since the world has become more sophisticated, where information is available on the internet, that there is a local young man who takes photos and uploads them to the internet, and since then this place has been visited by many foreign and domestic tourists, the road to the waterfall has been repaired to make it easier to access this place, and now this waterfall is used as one of the tourist attractions in Gianyar Regency.

Facilities at Kanto Lampo Waterfall

As a tourist destination that was just introduced and has become a boom on Instagram, this Kanto Lamp Waterfall has quite complete supporting facilities to facilitate tourists who come to this Kanto Lampo Waterfall to enjoy the beautiful scenery or just take pictures. There is a large enough parking lot that you can use to park your vehicle, and you don't have to worry about finding a parking space, besides that, toilet facilities are also provided for those of you who want to use the toilet and also a place to change clothes for those of you who want to change clothes. and swim in this place. there is also a small shop selling snacks and cold drinks that you can buy if you are thirsty. A very complete main facility for the convenience of tourists visiting this phenomenal and unique waterfall
